text:
India to view Jungle Book before U.S.

Disney’s The Jungle Book , starring 12-year-old Indian-American Neel Sethi as Mowgli, will come out in the Indian theatres on April 8, a week before it releases in the U.S. “We are thrilled to confirm that Disney’s all-new live-action epic, The Jungle Book , will be out in Indian theatres a week prior to the U.S. release. We have a few more surprises in store for fans in India,” Amrita Pandey, vice president, Studios, Disney India, said. The movie is helmed by Iron Man director Jon Favreau, and features voices by iconic actors like Ben Kingsley, Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson, Idris Elba and Christopher Walken. — IANS
title: The Jungle Book to hit Indian screens a week before US
